note.p: Daughter of David Smith, land surveyor and civil engineer of Glasgow, and his wife Jane Lucas. Eloped with and married William Dawson Hooker in 1839. Her middle name may have been Whitelaw (as in one marriage record) but it is Whitehead in other records: however no middle name was noted at Isabella’s baptism.
